name: youtube-all-html5
description: Play (almost) all videos on youtube without flash.
author: Klemens Sch√∂lhorn

preferences.name: autostart
preferences.title: Autostart
preferences.description:
Try to autostart videos upon loading of the site.
(You can still use the button, if this fails)

preferences.name: resolution
preferences.title: Resolution
preferences.description:
Change resolution of the inserted video.
("Default" keeps the youtube default)

preferences.name: loadtype
preferences.title: Load video using
preferences.description: Specify the method used to display the video as HTML5 video.

options.label: Player API (faster, but depending on your configuration maybe less reliable)
Embedded player (use this if API does not work)
